law.catch_line: Civil liability for violation of regulations -- Right to enter lands.

text.section: The board may provide by ordinance that any landowner or occupier who sustains damages from any violation of land-use regulations by another landowner or occupier may recover damages from the other landowner or occupier for the violation.
The supervisors may go upon lands within the district to determine whether land-use regulations are being observed.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42i-10.
